SENT.plain: Chromosome analysis was performed on cells obtained from the pleural effusion of a Japanese patient with Burkitt's lymphoma
Two modal chromosomal numbers were found: 45 and 46
Five different karyotypes were present, all having a t (8q-;14q+) translocation
This case illustrates that Burkitt's lymphomas of Japanese are no exception to the frequent association of this chromosomal abnormality with Burkitt's lymphomas
